ygData.subject: RE: So anyone wanna trade...
ygData.msgSnippet: I m very close to completing a Paw of Opolla.  This is perhaps the best non-Planes item for Clerics, Druids and Shamans (AC 9, STA +5, WIS +9, AGI +9, MANA +5,
ygData.messageBody:
I'm very close to completing a Paw of Opolla. This is perhaps the best
non-Planes item for Clerics, Druids and Shamans (AC 9, STA +5, WIS +9, AGI
+9, MANA +5, SV DISEASE -5 and CHA -5). I started the quest a few weeks ago
before we knew about the Lambent quests :-) A 50th Wiz on Fennin Ro the
other night was auctioning for trade a MM Battle Drum. I told him I was
close to completing the Paw and he offered to trade TWO sets of MM Battle
Drums for the completed Paw. A friend of mine that is familiar with the Wiz
says that he bought the drums on ebay, I dunno...

What is the consensus? Is this a fair trade? Be it known that I've camped
Paw pieces for approximately 25 hours and had to get my baking skill up as
well (and we bards are the brightest bunch). At 28th I think that I'm
approaching the level that I would expect to be able to get a MM Battle Drum
with my own group. Is this correct?

Crier Sharpsong


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Saturday, October 30, 1999 2:09 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] So anyone wanna trade...
>
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> if you have the mm drum, and you want a full set of rubicite for it...
> lunacy is a kind way of putting it =P
>
> hmm, i guess it works the other way too, if you want to give away
> a full set
> of rubicite for a mm drum that would be a bit of insanity as well.
>
> recent examples...
>
> i was offerred 7000pp and a molten cloak or my rubicite chest
> alone (really
> the only good piece of rubicite).
>
> at the freeport auction, a full set of rubicite WITHOUT the
> breastplate went
> for 10000pp and a mithril chest.
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Erisi Dlarit, L24 High Elf Paladin
> Tyria Sarkin, L24 High Elf Wizard
> Manda D'ulin, L20 Wood Elf Warrior
> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
> >
> > From: "Lange, Stephen" <SLANGE@...>
> >
> >
> > Me a full set of Rubicite for my Mistmoore Battle Drum? (On Prexus)
> > Do you all think this idea is just pure lunacy on my part?
> >
> >
> > -Orchestro
> > Prexus
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> toren@... with the subject lol.
